content:
Can you spot the false statement among the following options? 
A) The equator is the highest point on Earth.
B) The North Pole is the highest point on Earth.
C) Mount Everest is the highest point on Earth.
D) The Mariana Trench is the lowest point on Earth.

The false statement is:
A) The equator is the highest point on Earth.

The equator is not a point of elevation; it's an imaginary line around the middle of the Earth. The highest point on Earth is Mount Everest.
